column2: "...This is it, then. That should have given them enough time."
"My struggle was not in vain. So long as I have helped pave a path toward the future, I fear nothing."
"But... Alma. If it were at all possible, I wish I could have seen you one more time."
"...Aww, you're no fun Gi. Can't you tell it's me?"
"Sorry I'm late, Regius. But I won't let you fight alone. I'm here with you now."
"If your promise is too heavy for one person, then surely the two of us can keep it... Let's go, together."
"...Yes. We shall protect ARKS as one."
